title: Smart corporate typeface

comments.content: I think Smart had their custom proportional version of [Courier](http://web.archive.org/web/20131109014609/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/paratype/courier/pt-courier-bold/testdrive.html?s=smart%2Bforfour&p=48) made.
